name: pnrmtop

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cnrm))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ PNrm, c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ Nrm)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, cnrm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PNrm → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PNrm → c0 ∈ Nrm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Nrm → c0 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, cnrm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PNrm → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PNrm → c0 ∈ Nrm)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Nrm → c0 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PNrm → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Nrm → c0 ∈ Top)

comment: A perfectly normal space is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
